tasks.label: Test Current File with Coverage
tasks.command: docker-compose run --rm app npm run test:cov -- --runTestsByPath ${relativeFile}

tasks.label: Test Current File
tasks.command: docker-compose run --rm app npm run test -- --runTestsByPath ${relativeFile}

tasks.label: Test All with Coverage
tasks.command: docker-compose run --rm app npm run test:cov -- --runInBand --verbose --silent

tasks.label: Test All
tasks.command: docker-compose run --rm app npm run test -- --runInBand --verbose --silent
